products.name: JA 1'White/Black'
products.short_description: Classic. Clean. You can't go wrong with this timeless ebony and ivory combo that's as smooth as Ja snaking around a ball screen en route to storming some helpless defender at the rim. It's a meld that goes with any sort of drip, on court or off it. With Zoom Air, it supports bunny hops and hyper speed without sacrificing comfort, so you can control your own destiny on the court, Ja-style.
products.big_description:
Classic. Clean. You can't go wrong with this timeless ebony and ivory combo that's as smooth as Ja snaking around a ball screen en route to storming some helpless defender at the rim. It's a meld that goes with any sort of drip, on court or off it. With Zoom Air, it supports bunny hops and hyper speed without sacrificing comfort, so you can control your own destiny on the court, Ja-style.

Personal touch
The handwritten repeating 12am graphic speaks to his mindset of approaching every day with a grind mentality. Ja's signature, logo and jersey number are also sketched in his own handwriting.

Prepare for lift-off
A forefoot Zoom Air unit helps provide increased responsiveness and vertical acceleration. Plush cushioning in the midsole provides comfort when you come back to Earth after flying in the clouds.

Land softly
A containment system and forefoot strap help keep your ankle and heel stable so that you're in control and supported whether you're changing direction at high speeds, springing towards the rim or staying in front of pro ball-handlers on defence.

More benefits
The lightweight, breathable material on the upper helps keep your feet cool.
A raised foam collar adds ankle support.
Colour Shown: White/White/Black
Style: FQ4796-101

products.name: Jordan 1 Retro High 'Black/Red'
products.short_description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Bred' 2016 brings back the original 'Bred' colorway of the iconic silhouette. The high-top features a black and Varsity Red leather upper with a white midsole and red outsole. Nike Air branding on the tongue completes the classic look.
products.big_description:
The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Bred' 2016 brings back the original 'Bred' colorway of the iconic silhouette. The high-top features a black and Varsity Red leather upper with a white midsole and red outsole. Nike Air branding on the tongue completes the classic look.

More benefits
- Full-grain leather upper for durability
- PU midsole with Air-Sole unit in heel for cushioning
- Rubber outsole with deep flex grooves for traction and flexibility
- Colour Shown: Black/Varsity Red/White
- Style: 555088-001

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 21 'Core Black/Signal Green'
products.short_description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 in 'Core Black/Signal Green' features a sleek design and responsive cushioning. The Primeknit upper provides a snug, supportive fit, while Boost cushioning delivers energy return with every step. A Continental™ rubber outsole offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.
products.big_description:
The Adidas Ultraboost 21 in 'Core Black/Signal Green' features a sleek design and responsive cushioning. The Primeknit upper provides a snug, supportive fit, while Boost cushioning delivers energy return with every step. A Continental™ rubber outsole offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.

More benefits
- Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort
- Boost cushioning delivers responsive energy return
- Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energized ride
- Continental™ Rubber gives you superior traction
- Colour Shown: Core Black/Signal Green
- Style: GY4917

products.name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 'White/Black'
products.short_description: The Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 'White/Black' puts a fresh spin on the classic hoops silhouette. The leather upper features stitched overlays for added durability and support, while Air-Sole cushioning provides all-day comfort. A rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.
products.big_description:
The Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 'White/Black' puts a fresh spin on the classic hoops silhouette. The leather upper features stitched overlays for added durability and support, while Air-Sole cushioning provides all-day comfort. A rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.

More benefits
- Leather upper for premium comfort and durability
- Perforations enhance ventilation
- Air-Sole unit in heel provides cushioning and impact protection
- Rubber outsole for durability and traction
- Colour Shown: White/Black
- Style: CT2299-100

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low 'Black'
